General.Name: Ting Sin Co Ltd
General.Description: Ting Sin Co.,Ltd manufactures and supplies aluminum alloy billets worldwide. The company offers aluminum ingots, alloy rods, and aluminum plates; deoxidizers for steelmaking; and magnesium nails, as well as aluminum/magnesium alloys. It also provides leather products, such as belts for men and women, as well as leather and canvas materials. The company was formerly known as MAG Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ting Sin Co.,Ltd in 2014. Ting Sin Co.,Ltd was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Hung Yi  Tsai
1.Title: Director & Associate GM of Financial Department
